description: Streamlined design means nothing comes between you and a great workout. A solid playlist provides that extra bit of energy you need to train at your best, but it's not always safe to focus entirely on your music. Bone conduction technology sends sound vibrations directly to your inner ear, leaving your ear canal free to take in the world around you. Trekz Air Headphones let you listen to music and make and answer phone calls without interrupting your training, and their dual inline microphones filter out noise pollution to deliver clear calls in nearly any environment.Bone conduction sends sound vibrations directly to your inner ear. This leaves your ear canal free and clear, letting your music be the soundtrack to your world, not all that you hear.Dual noise-cancelling microphones help remove noise pollution, making voices crisp and clear.Equalizer pre-sets help you fine-tune your listening experience.Titanium band is lightweight, strong and provides an even, comfortable pressure.Bluetooth 4.2 is easy on power consumption and enables multi-point pairing.IP55 weatherproofing shrugs off sweat, rain and almost everything else Mother Nature might throw at you.6 hours of playback or 20 days of standby from a single charge.Charging only takes 2 hours.LED power indicator lets you know how your battery is doing.Integrated buttons let you answer calls, control your music and more.Volume and playback controls work with both Android and iOS.In the box: headphones, storage pouch, earplugs, micro-USB charging cable and documentation.
name: AfterShokz Trekz Air Headphones - Unisex
